Competition.Name: Spring Plate
Competition.History: Spring Plate donated by XXXXXX on the 15th May 1980, in memory of XXXXX

Competition.Name: Bill Manton Cup
Competition.History: Bill Manton Cup donated by XXXXXX on the 15th May 1980, in memory of Bill Manton

Competition.Name: Three Club Trophy
Competition.Format: 9 Holes Single Stableford (Only the putter and two other clubs permitted)

Competition.Name: Captains Team Event
Competition.Format: 9 Holes team event, best two scores each hole, plus Yellow Ball

Competition.Name: Team Event
Competition.Format: 18 Hole Singles Stableford plus teams-of-4 (best 2 scores each hole and all four on Par 3s)

Competition.Name: Fun Cup
Competition.Format: 18 Hole Singles Stableford (exact playing detailed to be provided on the day)

Competition.Name: Christmas Texas Scramble
Competition.Format: 18 Hole Texas Scamble, played as a medal, not stableford. At least three tee shots must be used from every player
